title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7350.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7350.1 - Policy

State Regulations
(a) Consistent with
the requirements of this Part, the director shall develop written policies and
procedures that govern sanitation for the facility. The written policies and
procedures shall be reviewed annually and updated as needed. (b) The director shall require that the
facility is maintained in a sanitary manner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7350.1

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
